patterns: how many classes will be there in a day

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of karnataka. We adopt a outcome based teaching methodology, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details. visit website for further details
There are assignments which carry more weight than your written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 7:00 am to 5:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our college has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.

patterns: Can you give me information about the college?
responses: We offer a wide range of courses, including computer science, engineering, business, and more. You can find more information about our courses on our website. The admission process involves submitting an application, transcripts, and test scores, and meeting certain academic requirements. You can find more information about the admission process on our website.

Our college offers undergraduate and graduate degree programs, including computer science, engineering, business and more. To know more about the programs you can check our website. The admission process includes application form, Transcripts, Test scores and meeting the academic requirements. For more details on this please check the college website.

patterns: Can you tell me about the faculty?
What are the qualifications of the faculty?
Can you give me information about the professors?
responses: Our faculty is made up of highly qualified and experienced professionals, many of whom have advanced degrees and real-world experience in their field. You can find more information about our faculty, including their qualifications and areas of expertise, on our website.

We have a team of highly qualified and dedicated faculty members who bring a wealth of knowledge, experience and expertise to the classroom. They hold advanced degrees from reputed universities and have Industry experience as well. You can find more information about our faculty on our website.

patterns: How much does it cost to attend?
responses: The cost of attending our college varies depending on the program and your status as a student. You can find information about tuition and fees on our website. Financial aid is available to eligible students in the form of scholarships, grants, and loans. More information about financial aid can be found on our website.

Tuition fee vary by program and student status, you can check the college website for the same. We have a financial aid program which includes scholarships, grants and loans to help students with their education. Check the college website for more information.
